a.title: WCISD FAMILY
a.strong: Click HERE for the transfer application, as well as the transfer guidelines.

div.p: Thank you for your interest in Whiteface CISD and our small town #WCISDFAMILY atmosphere! WCISD focuses on the INDIVIDUAL support each student needs, where you are more than just a number, you are FAMILY!

p.strong: Believe it or not, we do currently have a FEW spots for your children currently open. However, you better hurry because they are filling up FAST, as parents in our area also want; small classes, individualized instruction, family atmosphere, and hands on engaging curriculum that WCISD provides.
